course_name: Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering Lab
summary: Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering Lab is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 14 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Electronics Fundamentals and Applications – Chattopadhyay & Rakshit
Electrical Technology Vol-II – B. L. Theraja
course_outcomes: Explain and apply the working and characteristics of electrical machines and rectifiers.
Analyze and verify characteristics of discrete electronic components such as diodes and BJT.
Design and demonstrate Zener voltage regulator, rectifiers and transformer-based circuits.
Verify and analyze basic circuit theorems.
Measure and calculate power in AC circuits.
prerequisites: Knowledge of drawing of graphs with proper choice of unit
